abstracts.cdata!:
The project would provide urban sewerage
            improvements in the Tunis area. It includes additional
            master sewers, renewal and extension of an existing
            treatment plant and construction of two additional plants,
            extension and renewal of existing sewers, technical
            assistance and equipment to aid in the establishment of
            ONAS; and consultant services for feasibility studies for
            sewerage projects included in the Fifth Plan (1977-1980),
            for a construction industry study and training program, and
            for land use studies by the Tunis District.
